name: THICK & CHUNKY | brave a - 46
description:
This is colonial wool (not merino). Not as soft as merino, but a little sturdier. (doll hair)

THICK & CHUNKY | BRAVE A - 46

FIBER: wool
YARDAGE: 46 yard skein
wpi : 3-5 super bulky
2.4 oz

CARE: Gently hand wash, lay flat to dry. Yarn will felt.

Follow me on Facebook : Winding the Skein

description:
Thick and thin wool art yarn. I like to make Snuggly Cowls out of this type of yarn, but use your imagination to create whatever you like!

COLOR: katlyn art yarn
FIBER: wool, silk noil, bamboo
YARDAGE: 56 yard skein
wpi : 3-5 Super bulky 
3.1 oz.

Snuggly Cowl Link:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/171817051/instant-download-002-snuggly-cowl-thick?ref=shop_home_active

name: LUXE | vibrance - 200
description:
LUXE is a wonderful, lofty single commercially spun yarn with a great sheen from the silk that knits up quick and with nice stitch definition. Hand dyed by Winding the Skein into OOAK colorways. 

COLORWAY: Vibrance
Single
60% merino wool / 40% silk
Heavy worsted weight
3 oz / 200 yd
Gauge 4 sts/in, US 6-9 needle
hand wash in cool water/ dry flat

Follow me on Facebook : Winding the Skein
Also on Etsy 

I strive to provide a great product and wonderful customer service. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me at info@windingtheskein.com.

name: LOCKS | deep purple - 28
description:
Handspun Lockspun Mohair Yarn, super curly and bulky

This type of yarn is very time consuming because it first must be picked through to open the locks up and then spin. These are actual goat fleeces that I have washed and dyed and there are little bits of burrs and grass that you may find (hopefully not many) in them. I try to ge them all out but you may find a special surprise while working with it. It's real! :) 

Locks spun to showcase all the wonderful texture and curl. Use as accents on small newborn photography props, add a bit of color and texture to your baby hats, cocoons and pods or whatever else you can imagine. Take your items to a new level with these totally unique yarns.

COLOR: Deep Purple
FIBER: mohair locks
YARDAGE: 28 yard skein
SUPER Bulky
5.6 oz

Sign up to be notified of shop updates at http://www.windingtheskein.com
 
Follow me on Facebook : Winding the Skein
Also on Etsy
